statements: UPDATE quantum_algorithms SET algorithm_name = 'Grover' WHERE algorithm_id = 1;
UPDATE quantum_algorithms SET parallelization_strategy = 'Data Parallelism', description = 'Uses data parallelism for parallel execution' WHERE algorithm_id = 2;

UPDATE quantum_algorithms SET algorithm_name='Grover Search Algorithm', description='An algorithm that uses quantum parallelism to search an unsorted database efficiently', parallelization_strategy='Qubit-level parallelism' WHERE algorithm_id=1
UPDATE quantum_algorithms SET parallelization_strategy='Hybrid parallelism', algorithm_name='Shor's Algorithm', description='A quantum algorithm for integer factorization' WHERE algorithm_id=2
UPDATE Quantum_Algorithms SET algorithm_name = 'Grover' WHERE algorithm_id = 1;
UPDATE Algorithm_Implementations SET parallelization_support = TRUE WHERE implementation_id = 2;
UPDATE Quantum_Algorithms SET parallelization_level = 3, algorithm_name = 'Grover Search' WHERE algorithm_id = 1;
UPDATE Algorithm_Implementations SET implementation_name = 'Quantum Simulator', parallelization_support = TRUE WHERE algorithm_id = 1 AND implementation_id = 2;
UPDATE QuantumAlgorithms SET parallelization_level = 3 WHERE algorithm_id = 1;
UPDATE QuantumComputers SET used_qubits = 20, available_qubits = 30 WHERE computer_id = 2;
UPDATE QuantumAlgorithms SET algorithm_name = 'Grover Algorithm', parallelization_level = 3 WHERE algorithm_id = 1;
UPDATE QuantumComputers SET used_qubits = 50, available_qubits = 150, brand = 'IBM' WHERE computer_id = 2;
UPDATE QuantumComputers SET brand='IBM Q', qubits_count=100 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE QuantumCircuits SET description='Quantum teleportation circuit', num_gates=20, name='Teleportation Circuit' WHERE id=5;
UPDATE quantum_tasks SET algorithm_id = 2 WHERE task_id = 1;
UPDATE quantum_tasks SET task_name = 'New Task Name' WHERE task_id = 3;
UPDATE quantum_algorithms SET algorithm_name = 'Grover Search', parallelization_level = 3 WHERE algorithm_id = 1;
UPDATE quantum_tasks SET algorithm_id = 2, task_name = 'Quantum Fourier Transform' WHERE task_id = 3;
